Name: Budgie Genetics Simulator
About the game: This is a short experience for those interested in budgie genetics. Breed budgies to discover new colours. Patterns of inheritance are based on real-world genetics (recessive, dominant, co-dominant, etc). Features: Discover over 20 realistic colour mutations. Unlock in-game achievements for breeding certain combinations. Watch your birds grow from egg to fledglings. Beware of the effects of inbreeding, which can reduce the number of eggs. Budgies can only breed a few times, so plan your pairings carefully.
